description:
Avant, trouver un médicament pour soi, pour son enfant ou pour un proche malade, pouvait prendre plusieurs heures

- Il fallait parcourir plusieurs pharmacies avant d’en trouver une qui dispose du médicament recherché

- Une fois la pharmacie trouvée, il fallait parfois jusqu’à 30 minutes pour être servi

Désormais grâce à PharMap, trouver un médicament partout au Bénin se fait en moins de 10 min. Un énorme gain de temps qui contribue à accélérer le processus de guérison de milliers de patients. 

Un nouveau grand pas vers notre mission : rapprocher le médicament du patient.

Conçu avec le cœur par PharMap Co.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.


We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.



GOLD STATUS IN THE APP
- The subscription costs $1.99 per month
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Private Policy - https://wachanga.com/privacy
- Terms of Use - https://wachanga.com/terms

Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today! 

Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development 
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets
► Pregnancy Week-by-Week Guides explain what to expect in each pregnancy week
► Simple & informative Pregnancy Timeline highlighting important milestones

Pregnancy Guides & Information
► In-depth Pregnancy Guides covering breastfeeding, exercise, food, twins & more 
► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse
► Daily Blog Posts with tips, tricks & helpful advice
► Upload photos in My Bump to create a visual pregnancy diary

Pregnancy Tools
► Pregnancy Due Date Calculator helps you work out when your bundle will arrive
► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity
► Pregnancy Weight Log helps you keep an eye on changes in your weight
► Contraction Timer measures contractions throughout your labour

Organise & Plan
► Pregnancy Calendar enables you to plan & document your prenatal appointments
► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby
► Birth Plan allows you to customise, organise & export your needs & wishes
► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy
► Search thousands of Baby Names for inspiration & share your favourites

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you. 
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail
► Watch guided pregnancy week-by-week walk-throughs
► Tap to see baby movements

Pregnancy Articles & Guides
If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.

Share your journey with friends & family
Our pregnancy tracker app can be personalised so your partner, future grandparents or best friend can join in the fun and follow your baby's development in the womb, from bump to birth! Keep everyone up to date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.

Follow us on Social Media
Facebook: facebook.com/PregnancyPlusApp
Instagram: @pregnancyplus

◆ Download Pregnancy+ App today ◆

Privacy Policy
https://info.philips-digital.com/PrivacyNotice?locale=en&country=GB

Terms of Use
https://info.philips-digital.com/TermsOfUse?locale=en&country=GB

This app is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. Philips Consumer Lifestyle B.V. disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information, which is provided to you on a general information basis only and not as a substitute for personalised medical advice. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

The Pregnancy + tracker app wishes you a healthy, full-term pregnancy and a safe delivery.

Discover the BabyCentre Pregnancy Tracker and Baby App – your perfect companion for pregnancy and parenthood!
Expecting? BabyCentre’s Pregnancy Tracker app is here to guide you every step of the way! Track your pregnancy week by week and day by day with expert pregnancy tips, foetal development videos, and content tailored to your unique pregnancy and parenting journey. Just enter your baby’s due date, and let our pregnancy app bring you personalised guidance, advice, and tools from the start of your pregnancy right through to your baby’s first birthday.
Our BabyCentre Pregnancy and Baby app offers everything you need in one place:
Track your journey with our pregnancy tracker
	•	Get daily updates on how your baby is developing, tailored to your exact stage of pregnancy.
	•	Enjoy a daily news feed with tips on pregnancy nutrition, pregnancy exercise, and pregnancy symptom management.
	•	Weekly pregnancy reminders, pregnancy checklists, and pregnancy insights make staying informed easy and fun!
Instant expert advice for pregnancy at your fingertips
	•	Need answers to your pregnancy questions? Our team of Midwives is here to help with real-time support for any pregnancy questions that come up.
	•	Access hundreds of expert articles on every pregnancy topic from BabyCentre, guiding you from bump to baby.
Join a community of mums and new parents
	•	Connect with mums-to-be in your Birth Club, where you can share, ask, and learn about pregnancy together.
	•	Chat with other parents about baby names, early pregnancy symptoms, baby essentials, and everything else related to pregnancy.
Find the perfect baby name
	•	Looking for a baby name finder? Our Baby Name Tool helps you explore thousands of baby names and meanings for your pregnancy journey.
…and so much more!
	•	Use our due date calculator to track your pregnancy, see interactive foetal development images throughout pregnancy, track your bump in our “Bumpie” pregnancy photo diary, and dive into exclusive “Inside the Uterus” pregnancy videos.
From pregnancy to the first year of your baby’s life, our pregnancy app evolves with you, bringing expert pregnancy advice, a supportive community, and all the essential tools you need for a smooth pregnancy experience.
Download the BabyCentre Pregnancy and Baby App today and enjoy every step of your pregnancy journey!
All health information in our pregnancy app is approved by the BabyCentre Medical Advisory Board and certified by the NHS England Information Standard.
Let's connect! Facebook: facebook.com/BabyCentreUK Instagram: @babycentreuk Twitter: @babycentreuk Pinterest: pinterest.com/babycentre YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3gaQduurXoDOFMSNSKnJVA

Easily keep track of your health with the Doctolib app:
• Access the availabilities of thousands of healthcare professionals from all specialities
• Find and book medical appointments 24/7 online for in-person or video consultations
• Send messages to doctors and therapists for follow up prescriptions, test results and more
• Add relatives to your account to easily manage their appointments
• Look after your child's appointments and documents together with another parent
• Get automatic reminders for appointments in the app so you never miss one

• Store your appointment history and medical documents

Doctolib - one of Europe's leading e-health companies:
• 80 million patients
• 900,000 healthcare professionals in France, Germany, and Italy

Your health. Your data.
Protecting your personal data is our absolute priority and influences everything we do at Doctolib.

The Doctolib app is available in English, French, German, and Italian.

"The standard for clinical calculations and analytics in Medicine™".

MediCalc® is the best and most innovative Clinical Decision Support tool in the world, now featuring the mCalx™: a game-changer, Master Medical Calculator, for custom, disease- & patient-specific computations. You add equations & scores ad lib to the same panel!. The calx are "linked" to the "dynamic tables" for visually efficient "point of care knowledge & info". MediCalc® is now Integrated with iDox® and ready for your HOSPITAL EHR/EMR.

-----------------------------------
Join our more than half a million users worldwide!  
-----------------------------------
MediCalc® leapfrogs the competition with the most advanced and comprehensive "Medical Calculator System™", performing automatic and integrated computation of more than 500 clinical Formulas, Equations & Scores "commonly used" in medical practice. In addition, we don't do Advertising!

MediCalc® facilitates the organization and processing of Patient's data. 
It is a physician-friendly™ app, intuitive and very easy to use. 
Available ONLINE (free access & Print options). 

+Unique Clinical decision, reference and productivity tool. 
+Trusted resource with proven and reliable data processing.
+For physicians, residents, med students, PAs and NPs... 
+Developed by Board-certified physicians in the US. 
+Evidence-based and Validated Selection 
+Highly acclaimed, reviewed and tested (since 1996). 

-----------------------------------
The MediCalc® FEATURES:

* Master mCalx™: Customizable Calculator Panel
* dynamic tables, synchronized with calculators
* arithmetical processing
* automatic unit conversion
* MultiCalx™ Panels
* multiple-unit entries
* color-coded normal-abnormal outputs
* normal values (range-checks & limits)
* intuitive user interface
* easy navigation and info access
* Search bar with filters
* smart decimal rounding
* Système International notation
* tables of parameters
* mobile & online (free access)
* fully referenced
* highly organized and standardized

-----------------------------------

mCalx™ Master calculator (customizable)

TOTAL STAGES INFIRMIERS destinée aux étudiants en soins infirmiers, est la première application pratique et complète pour valider ses stages.

Les auteurs formateurs et professionnels de santé ont spécialement conçu l'application suivant les 3 temps majeurs du stage : préparation, déroulement, auto-évaluation.
Afin de répondre parfaitement aux besoins des étudiants, pour chaque discipline, TOTAL STAGES INFIRMIERS propose en 3 rubriques tous les éléments indispensables du stage.

Rubrique 1 - Les outils
Toutes les fiches de stages indispensables.
    - Fiches de pharmacologie.
    - Fiches de pathologies.
    - Fiches des examens complémentaires.
    - Fiches d'activités de soins.
    - Lexique.
    - Abréviation.

Rubrique 2 - Les prérequis
Rappel des connaissances au travers de schémas d'anatomie et de 55 QCM (corrigés, notés et enregistrés).
- Anatomie-physiologie : rappel de cours en schémas et QCM.
- Physiopathologie : QCM.
- Pharmacologie : QCM.
- Examens complémentaires : QCM.
- Calculs de doses et de débits : QCM.
- Surveillances infirmières selon les pathologies : QCM.

Rubrique 3 - Les stages
Organisée selon les 3 temps du stage (préparation, déroulement, auto-évaluation) pour réussir son évaluation.

Temps 1 - Préparation (notions nécessaires avant de partir en stage)
- Liste des activités de soins.
- Liste des situations de soins emblématiques.
- Liste des compétences à travailler.
- Liste des cibles prévalentes et diagnostics infirmiers prévalents.
- Formuler des objectifs adaptés (par semestre)

Temps 2 - Déroulement
- Analyses d'activité de soins : 2 exemples complets et analysés en tenant compte des points abordés dans le portfolio.
- Analyses de situation de soins : 2 exemples complets et analysés en tenant compte des points abordés dans le portfolio et en privilégiant l'analyse d'une situation clinique visant à produire un projet de soins.

Temps 3 - Auto-évaluation des compétences et des activités en 414 QCM 
- 333 QCM détaillés par compétences (correction, cotation et enregistrement).
- 81 QCM détaillés par activités (correction, cotation et enregistrement).

TOTAL STAGES INFIRMIERS est en achat définitif, c'est-à-dire que (qu') :
- les mises à jour sont gratuites (aucun abonnement supplémentaire) ;
- l'achat est en multi-poste (téléphone, tablette, ordinateur avec synchronisation automatique).
- elle est consultable sans connexion.

Alors, bon stage !

Each bone of the human skeleton has been reconstructed in 3D, you can rotate and zoom in on each model and observe it in detail from any angle.
By selecting models or pins you will be shown the terms related to any specific anatomical part, you can select from 11 languages and show the terms in two languages simultaneously.

"Skeleton" is a useful tool for students of medicine and physical education, for physicians, orthopedists, physiatrists, physiotherapists, kinesiologists, paramedics, nurses and athletic trainers.

HIGHLY DETAILED ANATOMICAL 3D MODELS
• Skeletal System
• Accurate 3D modeling
• Surfaces of the skeleton with high resolution textures up to 4K

SIMPLE AND INTUITIVE INTERFACE.
• Rotate and Zoom every model in the 3D space
• Division by regions for a clear and immediate visual of each structure
• Possibility to hide every single bone
• Intelligent rotation, automatically moves the centre of rotation for easier navigation 
• Interactive Pin allow visualization of the  term relative to every anatomical detail
• Hide / Show interface, ideal for use on smartphones
• Search function to easily find every anatomical part

MULTI-LANGUAGE
• The anatomical terms and the user interface are available in 12 languages: Latin, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Turkish
• The language can be selected directly from the interface of the app
• The anatomical terms can be shown in two languages simultaneously

"Skeleton" is part of the collection of apps for the study of human anatomy "Anatomy 3D Atlas".

This app helps you monitor your baby's development. It can help you follow the baby's sleep patterns: how long they sleep and whether they are keeping to schedule. Breast feeding: how much and how often your baby eats. Pumping schedule. Diaper changes. Also, you can keep a record of your baby's health: temperature, illnesses, vaccinations and doctor's visits. Add notes on your baby's mood and important events, such as: first words, first laugh, etc. Record changes in weight, length and head size.

Main Tracking Features: 
* Feeding (by breast, bottle or baby food) 
* Diaper changes 
* Sleep, activity and mood changes 
* Breast pump scheduling 
* Extra notes for doctor's visits and vaccinations 
* Add changes to size and weight 
* Add photographs and comment on events 
* Convenient layout and organization for journal and notes

If you have any questions or requests, please write to neumandev@gmail.com. We are eager to hear your comments on how to improve the app.

Developed for health workers and midwives. Includes English, Spanish, Kiswahili, French and Portuguese. Works offline. 

Safe Pregnancy and Birth provides accurate, easy-to-understand information on pregnancy, birth, and care after birth. Clear illustrations and plain language make this award-winning app practical and user-friendly for community health workers, midwives, and individuals and their families. Free and small to download, this app includes English, French, Kiswahili and Spanish and works offline.


INSIDE THE APP:


• staying healthy during pregnancy – how to eat well, what to check during pregnancy, how to manage nausea and other common complaints
• making birth safer – supplies to have ready before birth, how to help during each stage of labor, recognizing warning signs and when emergency care is needed
• care after birth – how to care for the baby and parent immediately after birth, and in the first week, including post-partum depression and breastfeeding support
• how-to information – quickly reference essential health care skills by topic
• pregnancy calculator


Safe Pregnancy and Birth App complements and supports the work of midwives, birth attendants, health educators, and communities to improve maternal and child health around the world. Like all apps from Hesperian Health Guides, it has been community-tested and vetted by medical professionals. This app does not collect personal information.

Once downloaded, the app does not require an internet connection. If connected, users will be able to access links to additional information on sexual and reproductive health, gender-based violence, and resources for LGBTQIA+ people and people with disabilities.

VETTED BY PROFESSIONALS. DATA PRIVACY.  

Like all apps from Hesperian Health Guides, the Safe Pregnancy and Birth app has been community-tested and vetted by medical professionals. Although developed for frontline and community health workers, it is also well-suited for individuals seeking information for themselves or their friends. This app does not collect any personal information so users’ health data will never be sold or shared.

Get accurate, comprehensive, and user-friendly information on ending a pregnancy. Written in easy-to-understand and nonjudgmental language, the Safe Abortion app can also help people needing or giving post-abortion care. Free, discreet and small to download, this app includes 11 languages and works offline. 
Use the pregnancy calculator to learn what options are available—including abortion with pills—by number of weeks. Helpful illustrations offer clear instructions on how to use abortion pills. Vetted by professionals and tested by health workers, Safe Abortion is trusted by reproductive health advocates and accompaniers worldwide. We do not collect any personal information so your health data will never be sold or shared.  
INSIDE THE APP: 
•	Find clear and complete descriptions of safe abortion methods: abortion with pills, suction, and dilation and evacuation 
•	Get information on the correct doses for and ways to use misoprostol pills (with or without mifepristone) for medication abortions at different weeks 
•	Learn what to expect during and after an abortion, including how to respond to warning signs if they arise 
•	Prepare and plan for safely managing an abortion with a checklist, and find suggestions for how to care for your body and feelings 
•	Explore “for your country” information to find organizations that can help as well as links to relevant legal regulations  
•	Listen to information with the read aloud feature when using the app in English, Spanish or French 
FAQs offer quick reference to other health information like how soon you can get pregnant after an abortion, whether an abortion can affect pregnancies in the future, when monthly bleeding resumes, what birth control methods are there if you do not want to become pregnant again, and other common questions about abortion. 
Language choices in the app are Afaan Oromoo, Amharic, English, Español, Français, Igbo, Kinyarwanda, Kiswahili, Luganda, Português, and Yoruba. Change between all 11 languages at any time.  
DISCREET. WORKS OFFLINE & SMALL TO DOWNLOAD  
To be used by individuals, health workers, and advocates, Safe Abortion from Hesperian Health Guides is small to download (under 40mb) and designed to ensure user privacy.  
•	On your device the name beneath the app icon shows only as “SA”  
•	After downloading, Safe Abortion works fully offline without a data plan or internet access  
•	We do not collect any personal information!  
The Safe Abortion App from Hesperian Health Guides complements and supports the work of activists, organizations and collectives who make sure people all over the world have access to safe abortion.

Hesperian Health Guides’ Family Planning app provides accurate, up-to-date information on contraceptive methods so people can choose the method that best matches their preferences and needs. Developed for frontline health workers, local leaders, and peer promoters, this app is filled with clear photos and illustrations, easy-to-understand information, and interactive tools to support conversations about reproductive health.   

This free, multilingual app works offline without a data plan and covers essential topics for family planning counseling including how each method is used, how well it prevents pregnancy, how easily it can be kept secret, and side effects.  

INSIDE THE APP:  
•	contraceptive methods – information on barrier, behavioral, hormonal, and permanent methods with the effectiveness, advantages, and disadvantage of each  
•	Method Chooser – an interactive tool that helps users find the contraceptive methods that best match their preferences, lifestyle, and health history  
•	FAQs – answers to many general questions about contraception and common concerns about specific methods like whether you can reuse condoms, and when you can start each method after giving birth, having a miscarriage, or having an abortion  
•	tips and interactive counseling examples – improve your counseling skills, comfort with discussing reproductive health information, and ability to support people from a variety of backgrounds and walks of life  

Once downloaded, the app does not require an internet connection or data plan. Language choices in the app are Afaan Oromoo, Amharic, English, Español, Français, Kinyarwanda, Kiswahili, Luganda, and Português. Change between all 9 languages at any time. Listen to information with the read aloud feature when using the app in English or Spanish.

VETTED BY PROFESSIONALS. DATA PRIVACY.  

Like all apps from Hesperian Health Guides, the Family Planning app has been community-tested and vetted by medical professionals. Although developed for frontline and community health workers, it is also well-suited for individuals seeking information for themselves or their friends. This app does not collect any personal information so users’ health data will never be sold or shared.

A true and totally 3D app for studying human anatomy, built on an advanced interactive 3D touch interface.

Features:
- You can rotate models to any angles and zoom in and out.
- Remove estructures to reveal the anatomical structures below them.
- 3D location quizzes to test your knowledge
- Switch on/off different anatomy systems
- Both male and female reproductive systems are available

Contents:
- Bones
- Ligaments
- Joints
- Muscles
- Circulation (arteries, vein and heart)
- Central nervous system
- Peripheral nervous system
- Sense organs
- Respiratory
- Digestive
- Urinary
- Reproductive ( both male and female)

Explore human anatomy, physiology, and the life sciences in interactive 3D with Visible Body Suite! This subscription gives you access to our entire content library on your phone, tablet, and computer, combining the features of Physiology & Pathology, Muscles & Kinesiology, Visible Biology, Anatomy & Physiology, and Human Anatomy Atlas. Join the millions who’ve set aside the textbook, lab specimens, and plastic models and jump into an immersive 3D experience with Visible Body Suite!

Visible Body Suite includes:

Comprehensive 3D Models:
Complete and dissectible male and female gross anatomy, microanatomy, cross-sections, and pathology 3D models. Explore DNA, chromosomes, prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells, plant tissues, and fully dissectible vertebrate and invertebrate models (sea star, earthworm, frog, pig). Compare normal anatomy to common conditions like sprains, kidney stones, and endometriosis.

Interactive Learning & Simulations:
Walk through interactive lessons on physiological processes and pathologies. Visualize conduction in a dissectible, 3D beating heart while following along on an ECG for which you can set the heart rate. Manipulate dozens of muscle action animations to understand biomechanics. Interact with and study virtual simulations of photosynthesis, cellular respiration, mitosis, meiosis, and DNA coiling.

Extensive Information:
Access detailed information for thousands of anatomical structures, including definitions, pronunciations, and common diseases and conditions, as well as in-depth material about muscle attachments and innervation, and bony landmarks.

Engaging Visuals:
Dissect 3D anatomy models on screen or in augmented reality (AR). Watch 3D animations that explain gas exchange, pulmonary ventilation, fluid balance, peristalsis, muscle contractions, and more. View histology slides and diagnostic images.

Study & Assessment Tools:
Create and share 3D Flashcards. Label structures with tags, notes, and 3D drawings. Link sets of models in interactive 3D presentations to explain and review a topic. Take 3D dissection or multiple choice quizzes to test your knowledge and prepare for exams.

Key Body Systems Covered:
Cells and Tissues, Integumentary, Skeletal, Muscular, Nervous, Endocrine, Circulatory, Lymphatic, Respiratory, Digestive, Urinary, and Reproductive systems.

User-Friendly Features:
Simple controls, robust search engine, accessibility, adjustable settings, and multiple language options.

Perfect for medical practitioners, physical and occupational therapists, orthopedics, athletes, yogis, students, medical doctors, professors, and nurses, Visible Body Suite makes learning and teaching anatomy, physiology, and biology visual and engaging.

Subscriptions include multiple updates throughout the year at no additional cost!

SmartBP® is a digital blood pressure app that empowers you to record, observe, assess, and share your blood pressure reports utilising iOS devices and the Apple Watch. Moreover, SmartBP interfaces with Apple Health, providing your health data at your fingertips, and enabling you to be proactive in your own wellbeing. For those grappling with prehypertension or hypertension, SmartBP can aid in tracking progress, spotting trends, and managing all your blood pressure and heart measurements, with the ultimate goal of improving your overall cardiovascular health and blood pressure. SmartBP is a more intelligent way to handle your blood pressure readings and track your improvement.

Disclaimer:

- SmartBP permits you to log, track, and evaluate trends in your blood pressure. You can manually input your readings or use a blood pressure monitor to synchronise with SmartBP through Apple Health. SmartBP in itself does not measure blood pressure. A separate blood pressure monitor is required for this.

- SmartBP is NOT a replacement for a doctor or professional healthcare or advice. Any health-related information provided is for informational purposes only and should not be used to substitute the advice of healthcare professionals.

- SmartBP Cloud Sync is not a replacement for backing up your health data. While we strive for the highest data security, no measures can ensure 100% protection. Regular data backups are the user's responsibility.

For guidance on how to use the app, visit our website

Video: www.smartbp.app
FAQ: www.smartbp.app/faq

Features-

- Log your systolic and diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate and weight. Body mass index (BMI), pulse pressure (PP) and mean arterial pressure (MAP) are automatically calculated. Either manually enter measurements or effortlessly sync them with a supported Bluetooth BP monitor.

- Swiftly add notes (e.g. before dinner) and measurement details (e.g. sitting, left arm) utilising tags.

- Store and access all your blood pressure readings anywhere and anytime using Apple HealthKit. Sidestep manual data entry and reduce mistakes by auto-uploading blood pressure readings to HealthKit by auto-syncing with SmartBP. The following Blood Pressure Monitors can link to HealthKit (check for compatibility with different models):

A&D
Omron
Beurer
Braun
Withings

- Share your blood pressure information with your doctor, healthcare provider or family using email, text message (SMS), Apple HealthKit. Create blood pressure reports in PDF format with blood pressure data, graphs and statistics and share with your GP or healthcare provider.

- View a 7, 14, 30-day summary grouped by daily morning/afternoon averages and tags. Create, share and print summary PDF reports and CSV files.

- Print PDF reports or graphs directly

- Analyse your progress through clear graphs and statistics (including mean and variability). Filter data using tags to assess lifestyle changes or medication effectiveness. Compare tagged graphs side by side and observe systolic vs. diastolic blood pressure correlations.

- Track your Heart Rate trends

- Sync ECG records

- Back up your health data and access it on all your mobile devices with SmartBP Cloud.  This is an optional service. We do not sell your health data.

- Sync directly between iPhone and iPad through Bluetooth or WiFi without sharing on the cloud.

- Back up blood pressure data by exporting to Dropbox, and Drive, or import from CSV files into the app.

- Protect your data with TouchID, FaceID or Pin keypad protection.

- Set medication reminders & track effectiveness.

- Intuitive colour coded data to identify normal, prehypertensive, stage I and II hypertension. These limits can be modified. Categorise your records based on 2017 ACA/AHA, 2023 ESC/ESH or create your own custom categories.

- Create multiple user profiles and manage them from a single app/device.

- Both US and international height and weight units are supported.

Calculatrice obstétricale. 

Avec cette calculatrice vous pouvez déterminer la date approximative de votre bébé est due. Il est basé sur une gestation normale dure en moyenne 40 semaines à partir du premier jour de la date de la dernière période menstruelle normale et la conception se produit généralement 2 semaines après le premier jour de la dernière période.

Tous les calculs doivent être confirmés avant utilisation. Les résultats proposés ne sont pas un substitut pour un essai clinique. Ni expresoweb.com ni aucune autre partie impliquée dans la préparation ou la publication de ce site ne sont responsables de toutes les copies spéciaux, indirects ou totales ou partielles résultant de l'utilisation de n'importe quel utilisateur.

Glucose Tracker is built for tracking blood sugar, A1C, medications and more. This makes it easy to identify trends and retain your data. It is simple to continue tracking weight and blood pressure. You can also schedule reminders to ensure that you are diligent about checking your blood sugar. Whether you have diabetes or prediabetes, this app makes it easy to track your blood glucose levels. Glucose also offers an estimated A1C calculator to help keep you on track in between lab measurements.

The app also tracks what time of day you are checking your blood sugar, such as first thing in the morning, before a meal, or before bed. You can also add a note to each record.

Glucose Tracker also allows you to track insulin, medication, A1C, blood pressure, carbohydrates, weight and ketones. It is a comprehensive app for both diabetics and prediabetics. You can also sync data between devices, export a report for a loved one or a health care professional, and even view a graph of your data. The app also has configurable reminders to check your blood glucose levels. This helps you make sure to check these levels to stay in control of your diabetes. Tracking has never been easier.

Glucose Tracker integrates with HealthKit by writing all inputted entries to the Health app.

Be in charge of your diabetes! Blood sugar tracking has never been this easy!

This diabetes tracker also has an estimated A1C level. Please note that this is just an estimate and should never be used for diagnostic purposes.

Terms of Service: https://www.glucoseforiphone.com/terms-of-service

This app is freely downloadable, however in-app purchase is required to unlock the contents. 
The complete Skeletal System and a few other contents are always freely accessible enabling you to try the app properly.

"Anatomy 3D Atlas" allows you to study human anatomy in an easy and interactive way. 
Through a simple and intuitive interface it is possible to observe every anatomical structure from any angle.
The anatomical 3D models are particularly detailed and with textures up to 4k resolution.

The subdivision by regions and the predefined views facilitate the observation and the study of single parts or groups of systems and the relationships between different organs.

"Anatomy - 3D Atlas" is an application aimed at medical students, doctors, physiotherapists, paramedics, nurses, athletic trainers and in anyone interested in deepening their knowledge of human anatomy.
This app is a fantastic tool to complement classic human anatomy books.

ANATOMICAL 3D MODELS
• Musculoskeletal system
• Cardiovascular system
• Nervous system
• Respiratory System
• Digestive System
• Urogenital system (male and female)
• Endocrine system
• Lymphatic system
• Eye and ear system

FEATURES
• Simple and intuitive interface
• Rotate and zoom each model in 3D space
• Option to hide or isolate single or multiple selected models
• Filter to hide or display each system
• Search function to easily find every anatomical part
• Bookmark function to save custom views
• Smart rotation which moves the center of rotation automatically
• Transparency function
• Visualization of muscles through levels of layers from the superficial ones down to the deepest ones
• By selecting a model or a pin, the related anatomical term shows up
• Description of the muscles: origin, insertion, innervation and action
• Show/Hide UI interface (very useful with small screens)

MULTILINGUAL
• The anatomical terms and the user interface are available in 12 languages: Latin, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Turkish
• The anatomical terms can be displayed in two languages simultaneously

developer: PERIOD TRACKER & PREGNANCY AND BABY CALENDAR LIMITED
description:
Pregnant? Get the free app for expectant parents to track how their baby is growing 

amma Pregnancy Calendar is an indispensable tool for expectant mothers! Get detailed information on the development of your baby at each week of pregnancy. Hundreds of thousands of women have already chosen to use this app, so join them, and us, on this incredible journey!

With amma Pregnancy Calendar you can easily:
- Get DAILY pregnancy info
- Track your pregnancy week-by-week over the 9 months 
- Get baby size information and development updates weekly
- Get information on changes in your body flow
- Manage weight and belly growth gain goals with clinical guidelines for your BMI
- Track contractions and send results to a medic with Contraction Timer
- Pregnancy+ Weight log
- Track baby kicks with Kick Counter
- Get more information about the weekly expectations of pregnancy 
- Share on Facebook, Email, Text & Twitter
- Personal Diary

and much more

Every woman who is expecting a child, is preparing herself for giving birth. Naturally, she will want to know how her baby is developing, what is happening to her body and what other changes are awaiting her until the birth. In this application, you will find a detailed weekly pregnancy calendar giving you ease of access to information about pregnancy and fetal development, changes in a pregnant woman's body, as well as tips on nutrition for pregnant women. For each week of pregnancy, there are four pieces of information: 
•	Baby development,
•	Mother’s body,
•	Mom’s meals,
•	Useful tips.
To use the pregnancy calendar, and count your due date, simply enter the date of your last period and you should see the information about your duration of gestation

This App is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

REMARQUE SPÉCIFIQUE SUR LE TÉLÉCHARGEMENT
*** Le téléchargement de cette appli se fait en 2 étapes : la première consiste à télécharger le modèle d’application, la deuxième consiste à télécharger entièrement le contenu de l’application. Cela peut prendre 5 à 10 minutes en Wi-Fi. Ne quittez pas l’appli avant d’avoir terminé les deux étapes de téléchargement. ***        

Actuellement, la quantité de données médicales double tous les 18 mois et le rythme s’accélère. Restez informés grâce à l’appli du Manuel MSD, version pour les professionnels de la santé.

L’appli du Manuel MSD, version pour les professionnels de la santé, propose aux prestataires de soins de santé, au personnel infirmier et aux étudiants des informations claires et pratiques sur des milliers de pathologies dans les principales spécialités médicales et chirurgicales. Elle aborde l’étiologie, la physiopathologie, le pronostic et les options d’évaluation et de traitement. 

L’appli du Manuel MSD, version pour les professionnels de la santé, propose :
• Des milliers de sujets rédigés et régulièrement mis à jour par plus de 350 médecins enseignants
• Des photographies et illustrations de milliers d’affections et de maladies
• Des vidéos pratiques sur de nombreuses procédures ambulatoires et consultations. Vidéos pédagogiques concises réalisées par des experts médicaux sur les principaux sujets suivants :
- Techniques d’immobilisation plâtrée et de contention
- Examens orthopédiques
- Examens neurologiques
- Procédures obstétriques
- Procédures ambulatoires (notamment IV, tubes, cathéters, réductions de luxations,...)
• Des questionnaires* de contrôle de connaissances des troubles médicaux, symptômes et traitements
• Des actualités médicales et des explications* sur des sujets médicaux courants et importants
• Des éditoriaux* rédigés par des experts médicaux qualifiés

* Un accès à Internet est nécessaire.

À propos des Manuels MSD
Notre mission est simple :
Nous pensons que les informations concernant la santé constituent un droit universel et que chacun a le droit d’avoir des informations médicales exactes, accessibles et exploitables. Nous avons la responsabilité de protéger, conserver et partager les meilleures informations médicales actuelles afin de permettre des décisions plus éclairées, d’améliorer les relations entre patients et professionnels, et d’améliorer les résultats thérapeutiques.
C’est pour cela que nous proposons gratuitement les Manuels MSD au format numérique aux professionnels et aux patients du monde entier. Aucun enregistrement ni inscription n’est nécessaire et il n’y a pas de publicités.

NOND-1179303-0001 04/16
Cette application est destinée aux professionnels de santé.
Pour plus d’informations, veuillez lire le contrat de licence d’utilisateur final sur
https://www.msd.com/policy/terms-of-use/home.html

Pour en savoir plus sur la protection des données personnelles, veuillez consulter notre politique de confidentialité sur https://www.msdprivacy.com

Signalement d’événement indésirable (EI) : pour signaler un EI survenant avec un produit MSD spécifique, contactez le centre de services national au 1-800-672-6372. Les pays autres que les États-Unis peuvent avoir des procédures spécifiques de signalement des EI. Pour plus d’informations, contactez votre bureau MSD local ou les autorités sanitaires de votre pays.

Pour toute question ou pour obtenir de l’aide, contactez-nous à msdmanualsinfo@msd.com

MedCalX is a tool that enables medical professionals to easily use complicated medical formulas, scores and classifications.
25 years of experience developing this tool for mobile platforms makes MedCalX the leading medical calculator, with an unparalleled user interface and powerful features.

MedCalX is free to download and use, but you have access only to a subset of formulas.
In-app purchase lets you unlock the whole range of formulas that MedCalX has to offer; more than 300 in total!

Main features:
• A very large selection (more than 300) of relevant formulas, scores, scales and classifications.
• Workflows: create your own series of formulas, text, links and images
• Many different ways to share results (and data): copy to clipboard, email report, print via AirPrint, save to patient database...
• Exclusive patient management feature for saving and accessing results, as well as images and notes. Results can be exported to the desktop as CSV files and shared between your and your colleaugues iOS devices.
• Detailed information and bibliographic references for each formula.
• Support for US and SI units, with easy switching from the keypad.
• Search for entries by name, keywords and categories.
• Takes advantage of iOS 9 – you can now use Spotlight to search for formulas
• Customizable list of favorite equations, synchronized via iCloud.
• Ability to add notes to individual formulas.
• Full support for external (hardware) keyboards

Formulas, scores and classifications include, amongst others:
• Anesthesiology (ASA, Bromage, Charlson, Cormack, Dermatome, Goldman)
• Cardiology (CC/AHA ASCVD, CHADS, EuroSCORE, GRACE, HAS-BLED, Killip, PROCAM, QT-c, TIMI)
• Electrolytes (Corrected Ca, Corrected Na, FENa, Osmolal gap)
• Evidence-Based Medicine (NNT, Odds, Sample size, Two-way table)
• ICU (ABCD2+3, APACHE, CAM-ICU, GCS, Parkland, SAPS, many PE-criteria and trauma scores)
• Neurology (AMTS, Aphasia, Canadian rules, NIHSS, WFNS)
• Obstetrics (APGAR, Bishop, Malinas, Pregnancy Wheel)
• Pediatrics (Age, Target Height, Centor and McIsaac, PRAM, WETFAG)
• Respiratory (BODE, Epworth, GOLD, SMART-COP, Spirometry, Thoracoscore)
• Renal (Cockcroft, MDRD and more Creatinine/GFR calculators, KDIGO and RIFLE)
• ABG analyzer worth $5 in other apps
• Complete infusion management tool, great for ICU nurses
• Complicated scores (CAM-ICU, CDAI, APACHE, POSSUM, SAPS, Euroscore)

If you like MedCalX, we’d appreciate it if you took the time to give us a nice review.

Besoin d’un avis médical rapidement et votre médecin n’est pas disponible ? Qare, c’est une équipe de médecins disponibles en moins de 15 minutes*, et plus de 23 spécialités médicales accessibles. Avec Qare, accédez à une téléconsultation vidéo avec un médecin en moins de 15 minutes*.

Première clinique digitale de France, Qare est agréée par le Ministère de la Santé depuis 2024. Qare réunit plus de 2 500 médecins, inscrits à l’Ordre des Médecins et formés à la téléconsultation. Depuis 2017, 3 millions de patients ont téléconsulté sur Qare et 97% sont satisfaits.

Avec Qare, vous pouvez choisir une consultation en ligne avec ou sans RDV. A l’issue de la consultation en visio et si nécessaire, vous recevez une ordonnance valable dans toutes les pharmacies de France, ainsi que vos documents médicaux dans votre espace patient sécurisé. Les téléconsultations sur Qare sont remboursables* par l’Assurance Maladie lorsque le parcours de soins est respecté.

Qare vous accompagne également pour la santé mentale et la gestion du poids avec des programmes personnalisés quotidiens.***

Qare, votre réflexe pour votre santé physique et mentale 

· Consultez un médecin en ligne en moins de 15 minutes*
· Avec ou sans rendez-vous,
· Téléconsultation vidéo remboursable par l’Assurance Maladie**
· Pour la santé du quotidien, la santé mentale et la gestion du poids
· Programmes d’accompagnement personnalisés en santé mentale et en gestion du poids***
· Service agréé par le Ministère de la Santé
· Ordonnances et documents médicaux sécurisés disponibles dans votre espace patient
· Généralistes et spécialistes, inscrits à l’Ordre des Médecins en France
· Suivi possible avec le même médecin
· Support patient réactif 7j/7 (réponse en 2 minutes en moyenne)

Une équipe de médecins de 23 spécialités rapidement et facilement accessibles

· Médecin généraliste
· Pédiatre
· Gynécologue
· Dermatologue
· Psychiatre
· Et de nombreux autres spécialistes

L’exigence médicale au service de tous

· Société de téléconsultation agréée par le Ministère de la Santé
· Créée en 2017 avec des médecins
· 3 millions de patients ont téléconsulté
· 9 millions de téléconsultations réalisées
· 97% de patients satisfaits
· Données de santé sécurisées

Avec Qare, vous pouvez

· Consulter rapidement un généraliste ou un spécialiste
· Obtenir un avis médical sans se déplacer
· Renouveler une ordonnance si nécessaire
· Suivre une maladie chronique quand votre médecin le juge adapté
· Obtenir un second avis médical 
· Bénéficier d’un suivi personnalisé et quotidien en santé mentale***
· Être accompagné(e) dans la gestion de son poids***

Exemples de motifs

· Médecin généraliste : infection urinaire, maladies chroniques, migraine, allergies saisonnières, suivi vaccinal, éruptions, IST, maux de gorge, troubles digestifs, rhinopharyngite…
· Psychiatre : stress, surmenage, burn-out, anxiété, phobies…
· Pédiatre : conjonctivite, alimentation, poux, varicelle…
· Gynécologue : SPM, grossesse, endométriose, mycoses, infections urinaires, vaginose, IST…
· Dermatologue : acné, eczéma, éruptions, démangeaisons…
· Addictologue : arrêt du tabac, réduction/arrêt alcool…
· Nutritionniste : gestion du poids, diabète, hypercholestérolémie, intolérances alimentaires…

Téléchargez Qare dès maintenant pour prendre soin de votre santé simplement et en toute confiance quand votre médecin n’est pas dispo.

Notes et mentions
* Moyenne septembre 2025, téléconsultations sans rendez-vous, médecine générale. Le délai peut varier selon l’affluence, la spécialité et l’heure.
** Lorsque le parcours de soins est respecté par le patient. Des frais non remboursables peuvent s’appliquer selon les services choisis.
*** Programme payant optionnel, non remboursable par la Sécurité Sociale et n'inclut pas de téléconsultations médicales

Vous êtes amené à rechercher de l’information sur le médicament, dans la pratique quotidienne ou lors de vos déplacements ? Bienvenue dans VIDAL Mobile, portail d’information sur le médicament pour le praticien nomade et l’étudiant. VIDAL Mobile est totalement gratuit et fonctionne sans connexion Internet.



*************************************


FONCTIONNALITÉS
- Monographies VIDAL
 • Une fiche d’information pour + de 11 000 médicaments et 4 000 produits de parapharmacie
 • Contenu conforme aux informations officielles et aux référentiels publics
 • Recherche par Nom commercial, Substance, VIDAL Recos, Indication, Laboratoire
- Fiches DCI VIDAL (dénomination communes internationales) disponible depuis la substance
 • Document décrivant les propriétés thérapeutiques d’une substance (DCI, dosage, voie, forme)
- VIDAL Recos
 • 185 stratégies thérapeutiques validées appuyées de grades de recommandation et 260 arbres décisionnels commentés
 • Rédigées par plus de 90 experts sous l'égide du comité scientifique VIDAL
 • Précieux dans le cadre de la FMC et de l’EPP, cet ouvrage s’adresse à tout professionnel de santé
- VIDAL Flash Cards
 • Une manière ludique de mettre à jour la connaissance sur les recommandations, basée sur les VIDAL Recos.
- Interactions médicamenteuses :
 • Ajout de monographies spécialités et DCI dans une ordonnance virtuelle
 • Analyse des interactions médicamenteuses de la prescription virtuelle par sévérité
- Effets indésirables classés par appareil et fréquence
- Modules d’équivalences internationales :
 • Recherche d’un médicament à partir du pays de provenance ou de destination
- Fil d’actualité VIDAL : actualité du médicament organisée par thématiques
- Reco du mois : une recommandation en accès libre
- Liste indicative des spécialités pharmaceutiques françaises contenant des produits dopants
- Lexique des maladies rares pour lesquelles il existe des médicaments spécifiques
- Reco Vaccinations, reprenant les recommandations officielles

Toutes les fonctionnalités sont gratuites. Les achats intégrés restent actifs pour le bon fonctionnement des versions précédentes.



*************************************


CONDITIONS D’USAGE & AUTHENTIFICATION
L’usage de VIDAL Mobile est destiné aux professionnels de santé habilités à prescrire ou à dispenser des médicaments ou à les utiliser dans l’exercice de leur art. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir vous authentifier avant d’accéder à l’application.
L’utilisation de VIDAL Mobile ne dispense pas le professionnel de santé de vérifier les informations disponibles auprès des autorités ou de toutes autres sources officielles. VIDAL Mobile ne remplace pas la décision du prescripteur, seul juge des thérapeutiques à envisager.

Pour accéder à notre page POLITIQUE DE PROTECTION DES DONNÉES PERSONNELLES ET VIE PRIVÉE : https://www.vidal.fr/donnees-personnelles
Lien vers nos Conditions Générales d’Utilisation : https://www.vidal.fr/vidal-mobile-apple-store

My Baby Heart Sounds is a quick and easy way to use your iPhone to listen, record and share your baby's heart sounds.

Not too long ago, we were pregnant mothers too. While our partners enjoyed listening to our babies' sounds by placing their ears on the tummy, we wanted to capture and share these precious audio-memories ourselves. We tried voice memo apps and other sound-recording apps but felt that there was something more we could do to improve the quality of the sound in a simple setup. Fast forward a couple years and here we are!

Why should you try this app?

- Minimum time to setup. All you need is your iPhone. Simple instructions are provided within the app and we are here to support you all the way.
- High quality sound. Using advanced audio signal processing techniques, we deliver a high quality audio experience that allows you to distinguish your baby's heart sounds. For best results use AirPods.
- Listen for free and only pay when you want to record and share.
- Secure. All recordings are stored on your phone. We do not have any access to your recordings. You decide how you would like to share your recordings.
- Track your pregnancy journey. Get weekly insights on pregnancy symptoms, learn how to read ultrasound scans, monitor contractions, and keep track of your baby’s movements with a kick counter.

For best results:

- Use the app when you are 20-30 weeks or greater pregnant.
- Use the app in a quiet room
- Remove any phone case/shell/cover (the iPhone needs to touch your skin to be able to pick up the sounds)
- Put the phone in Airplane Mode
- Start the app and place the iPhone on your tummy to listen for a clear sound. You may need to try a few different spots. Press "Record" to create a recording
- Use AirPods

My Baby Heart Sounds Disclaimer:

- The My Baby Heart Sounds app is NOT a Medical Device or application. It is NOT in any way suitable for medical opinion, advice or diagnosis, and it is NOT intended to provide any information about the person of use's wellbeing or health.
- The app does NOT backup recordings automatically outside the user's device. It is the user's responsibility to regularly backup their recordings.

Subscribe to access to premium app features; subscription details are the following:

- Length: weekly, yearly
- Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase
- Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period
- When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
